Parameters: int: The target item position to scroll to using instant scrolling.
jumpTo(int).Description: Instead of specifying pixels to scroll, use the target position to jump using @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#scrollToPosition_E@. You may prefer using this method if scroll target is really far away and you prefer to jump to a location and smooth scroll afterwards. Note that calling this method takes priority over other update methods such as @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SmoothScroller#Action#update_E@, @B_android#view#View#setX_E@, @B_android#view#View#setY_E@ and #@B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SmoothScroller#Action#setInterpolator_E@. If you call @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SmoothScroller#Action#jumpTo_E@, the other changes will not be considered for this animation frame.

Parameters: int: Duration of the animation in milliseconds
RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.Action(int,.FullName: RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.Action (int dx, int dy, int duration)

ClassDesc: Holds information about a smooth scroll request by a @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SmoothScroller_E@.
